name: places/ChIJkTwpWLpYwokRPH3VuAxX1s0
formattedAddress: 345 East 86th St, New York, NY 10028, USA
adrFormatAddress: 345 East 86th St, New York, NY 10028-4716, USA

originalText.text: We were looking for a preschool that celebrates diversity and values social/emotional intelligence with a strong academic curriculum. This school checked all the boxes. We have also been pleasantly surprised by the love and personal attention given to each student. We got to know the school through their playgroup program and my daughter seamlessly enrolled into their 2s. On her birthday, her teacher made a big Happy Birthday sign and the director personally sent her a birthday card. We have felt so welcomed and at home at this school. We've only been a part of this community for less than a year but we know  we made the right choice for our daughter. She loves going to school and comes home energized. I have already seen her confidence grow. Although we have not gone through the ex-missions process yet, we have heard about the individualized attention and care the school goes through to place your child. We look forward to our time at IPS for the next few years!

originalText.text: There is no preschool as wonderful as The International Preschools (IPS). From the incredibly caring and innovative teachers, to the warm administration and staff, to the welcoming and inclusive parent/student community, IPS is truly unparalleled.  Both of my children are IPS graduates and I marvel at how prepared they were for kindergarten and how IPS set them up for a lifetime love of learning. If you're looking for a "one-in-a-million" school for your child to start their educational journey, there's no place like IPS!

originalText.text: IPS is such a warm, special preschool - with a unique focus on celebrating international cultures and experiences. The student body is very diverse and eager to learn about each other as they learn about the world with fresh, wide eyes.  As an alum myself, it has been a joy to see my two children thrive at the school over the past 6 years.  The teachers are deeply experienced and caring, and we have made wonderful friends through our time at the school. IPS also has a strong track record of sending children to the ongoing schools of their choice. If you have a child 18 months to 5 years - definitely check out IPS. Highly recommended!
